attributes.action: Make petrol more affordable, so my family can survive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the past 12 months we have seen petrol prices rocket to well over £1 per ltr. In order for people to survive they must now fork out hundreds of pounds a month. With the cost of living at it's highest point ever, reduce the tax on petrol to make the hard working families of this country able to survive. People should not have to go without food and luxuries in order to provide for their families. 
Reduce the taxation on petrol and deisel so we can all live our lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
